Gotham City sleeps under the cover of darkness while two legendary bats take
flight. One is turning the city into an army of vampires while the other does
everything he can to stop the mayhem. But Dracula isn&#039;t simply one of The
Batman&#039;s usual foe&#039;s; he&#039;s got supernatural powers of strength, speed and mind
control. Even with his arsenal of high-tech gadgets, the Dark Knight is still a
mortal man. This is one face-off that could clip The Batman&#039;s wings
permanently!
